definition: along/to follow (a line, tradition etc)/to carry on/to trim (a border with braid, tape etc)/border/edge
"water" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 85), occurring in 没, 法, 流 etc/see also 三點水|三点水[san1 dian3 shui3]
mouth/classifier for things with mouths (people, domestic animals, cannons, wells etc)/classifier for bites or mouthfuls
front-line/forward position/outpost/extending ahead/frontier (of science, technology etc)
along the sides of the road/by the wayside
to continue to use (old methods)/to apply as before/according to usage
to carry on as before/to follow (an old custom etc)
evolution of sth over time/course of development/history
close to the border/along the border
Yantan district of Zigong city 自貢市|自贡市[Zi4 gong4 shi4], Sichuan
Yanhe Tujia autonomous county in Tongren prefecture 銅仁地區|铜仁地区[Tong2 ren2 di4 qu1], Guizhou
Yanhe Tujia autonomous county in Tongren prefecture 銅仁地區|铜仁地区[Tong2 ren2 di4 qu1], Guizhou
pinyin: Yan2 he2 Tu3 jia1 zu2 Zi4 zhi4 xian4

definition: well established/accepted as a result of long usage

sentences.english: The only non-ceasefire group active along the border is the Shan State Army "South"'s Force 701.
sentences.chinese: 沿邊境活躍的唯一非停火武裝是南撣邦軍701部隊。

sentences.english: So, the third guy is when we come back to the origin along the diagonal.
sentences.chinese: 第三部分沿對角線回到原點。

sentences.english: The car sped along the road towards the village.
sentences.chinese: 汽車沿公路朝那村子疾駛而去。

sentences.english: Pictured here: A couple walks through the Lavaux Vineyard Terraces along Lake Geneva in Switzerland.
sentences.chinese: 圖爲一對夫婦沿瑞士日內瓦湖在拉沃克斯葡萄園散步。

sentences.english: The whistlers propagating along these two different discrete paths have nearly the smae dispersion values.
sentences.chinese: 沿兩條不同路徑傳播的同源哨聲具有幾乎相同的色散。

sentences.english: Data recorded along two geophone axes are displayed as a function of time.
sentences.chinese: 沿兩個檢波器座標軸記錄的數據顯示爲一個時間函數。

sentences.english: Along the length of the filter, the interference film looks like a wedge .
sentences.chinese: 沿薄膜的長度方向看干涉膜似尖劈。

sentences.english: Automatically tricking water slides downwards along a filler to a pond, which eliminates the water falling sound and the drift ice phenomenon.
sentences.chinese: 自淋水沿填料下滑至水池，消除了落水聲和漂水現象。

sentences.english: He sauntered along Oxford Street looking at the shopwindows.
sentences.chinese: 他沿牛津街漫步觀看商店的櫥窗。

sentences.english: Then, you're gonna fold it in half once, lengthwise, lining up the edges, and really pressing down the seam.
sentences.chinese: 然後，你要把它沿縱向對摺，邊緣對齊，並壓平接縫。

sentences.english: Voyager began to move down the runway, slowly.
sentences.chinese: “航行者”號慢慢的沿跑道加速。

sentences.english: Nevertheless, he was looking out along the Ecliptic, in that general direction.
sentences.chinese: 但無論如何，它正在沿黃道面朝那個大致方向望出去。

sentences.english: In the Chinese chess, the chariot takes in a straight line.
sentences.chinese: 在中國象棋裏“車”沿直線喫子。

sentences.english: Put plastic wrap around the door frame of a commonly used door.
sentences.chinese: 找一扇常用的門，沿門框把整扇門用塑料薄膜包起來。

sentences.english: So the big rabbit sat on his hind feet. He reached the top of the basket.
sentences.chinese: 於是，大兔子用後腿站起來，這樣就夠着了筐的上沿。

sentences.english: Bowel or omentum may herniate alongside the drain .
sentences.chinese: 腸管或網膜可能沿引流物疝出。

definition: to detour/to bypass/to circumvent/to avoid/to wind around (of a road etc)
